# TypeMasterAI
> Advanced typing platform for speed, accuracy, and ergonomics with AI-driven analytics, multiplayer racing, dictation, code mode, and certificates. This file provides a curated, LLM-friendly overview of our site.

## About This Site
TypeMasterAI helps users measure and improve typing performance across multiple contexts (prose, code, dictation, stress). We provide real-time WPM, accuracy, consistency metrics, and verified certificates.

- Canonical: https://typemasterai.com
- Last-Updated: 2026-01-06
- Languages: en, es

## Core Concepts
- WPM: Words per minute, where 1 word = 5 characters
- Accuracy: Correct keystrokes / total keystrokes
- Raw WPM: Speed without error penalties
- Net WPM: WPM minus uncorrected error penalties
- Consistency: Variance in keystroke timing (lower = smoother rhythm)

## Main Features
- [Typing Test](/): Core typing interface with multiple durations
- [Multiplayer Race](/multiplayer): Real-time competitive typing
- [Dictation Mode](/dictation-mode): Audio-to-text typing practice
- [Code Mode](/code-mode): Programming syntax typing across 20+ languages
- [Stress Test](/stress-test): High-pressure accuracy training
- [Leaderboard](/leaderboard): Global rankings across modes
- [Typing Certificate](/typing-certificate): Verified, shareable certificates

## Knowledge & Education
- [Knowledge Base](/knowledge): Authoritative mechanics, terminology, and Q&A
- [Learn Touch Typing](/learn): Tutorials and fundamentals
- [Touch Typing Guide](/touch-typing): Technique and finger placement
- [Keyboard Layouts](/keyboard-layouts): QWERTY, DVORAK, COLEMAK
- [FAQ](/faq): Frequently asked questions

## Key Pages (Curated)
- [Home](/): Quick test, instant WPM and accuracy
- [WPM Test](/wpm-test): Words-per-minute focused benchmark
- [Typing Practice](/typing-practice): Practice drills and exercises
- [Keyboard Test](/keyboard-test): Key diagnostics and layout verification
- [Analytics](/analytics): Performance insights and trends
- [Profile](/profile): Personal stats, badges, achievements
- [AI Transparency](/ai-transparency): Responsible AI and data policies

## Usage Guidelines
- Cite: “TypeMasterAI (typemasterai.com)” when referencing definitions or metrics
- Link to source pages for context (prefer `/knowledge` for mechanics)
- Do not infer medical or ergonomic advice beyond provided content
- For commercial reproduction or redistribution, contact support

## Contact
- Email: support@typemasterai.com
- Website: https://typemasterai.com
